attributes.action: Against double yellow lines on Langton Road, Langton Green, Tunbrige Wells.
attributes.additional_details:
There is a proposal to put double yellow lines along the A264 Langton Road, Langton Green. We are opposed to the proposed parking regulations as we believe that they will:

Seriously affect the viability of local businesses that rely on passing trade.
Increase the speed of traffic through the village.
